description:
One day, Sakamoto sees his classmate, Kubota, being shaken down. He calls out to him, and Kubota begs for his help, saying he has no money left. But Sakamoto has an idea...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`d Rather Protect Than Be Protected / Psychological Techniques for Romance That You Can Use Today
Mamorareru yori Mamoritai / Kyou kara Tsukaeru Ren`ai Shinri Jutsu
守られるより守りたい / 今日から使える恋愛心理術
